title: Banana Leaf Vegan Thai Fusion
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Thai, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion
description: Thai fusion vegan restaurant opened Aug 2014 in Canggu area overlooking the rice fields. Menu items include such as mom's sweet chili sauce, tom yum soup, purple cabbage cups, spicy garlic eggplant, and hibiscus iced tea. Uses faux meats in dishes such as chicken satay, black pepper steak, pineapple sweet and sour chicken. Has Wi-Fi. Accepts SMS orders.
streetAddress: Jl. Subak Sari 84, Br. Tegal Gundul, Batu Belig
